DOC.brief_summary: To establish wether prophylactic intervention first trimester low-dose aspirin improve trophoblastic invasion evaluate third trim woman define high-risk abnormal uterine artery Doppler first trimester
DOC.brief_title: Aspirin Enhancement Trophoblastic Invasion Women With Abnormal Uterine Artery Doppler 11-14 Weeks Gestation
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year old attend routine ultrasound first trim pregnancy 11 14 week gestation ( Crownto rump length 4548mm ) Single gestation Mean pulsatility index uterine arteries 95th percentile population Preexisting hypertension , renal cardiovascular disease previous history preeclampsia Pregestational diabetes Systemic lupus Erythematosus Gastric ulcer Acetylsalicylic acid lactose hypersensitivity Bleeding disorder Fetal disorder ( include chromosomal abnormality ) Administration low molecular weight heparin Concomitant treatment aspirin
